segments.text: Let's see if we can reach some sort of agreement over your curfew .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . Everyone else's parents let them stay out until two or three in the morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well . I'm not everyone else's father . I think you need to be in the house by ten o'clock .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know some junior high kids who can stay out later than that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll be worried if you stay out late .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , how about a midnight curfew ? And I'll let you know where I am .
segments.speaker: S1
